Articles.Content: Is it possible to create a pulse detonation drive in KSP without the usage of any interstellar mods? I imagine blowing up small BD bombs behind a shield of armor.

Hi.

 

Intriguing.

I have an idea.....Wouldn't work from Kerbin. EDIT Woulnd't work anywhere. I just tested my idea in .01G It's a total bust.

You need to carry bombs and get enough delta-V to do work. The more bombs the less push....

Maybe from Minmus. Get to orbit.

Landing? I don't see how.
